---
title: "__init__"
description: "Initialize a NotteClient instance"
---



Initializes the NotteClient with the specified API key and server URL, creating instances
of SessionsClient, AgentsClient, VaultsClient, and PersonasClient.



## Parameters

<ParamField path="api_key" type="UnionType[str, None]" default="None">
  Optional API key for authentication.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="server_url" type="UnionType[str, None]" default="None">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="verbose" type="bool" default="False">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="viewer_type" type="SessionViewerType" default="browser">
</ParamField>
